name: Omamori
description:
A remote village, whose people suffer from their daily problems and concerns.

Help those people with a small gesture on you part: craft an Omamori.Go hunting for the spirits necessary for their creation and gift them away with love.

Controls:

GameShell (Xbox layout):

Arrows: Move.
A: Interact, charge sword attack.
X: Run,  or dash while charging the sword attack.

Keyboard:

Arrows: Move.
J: Interact, charge sword attack.
U: Run,  or dash while charging the sword attack.

Omamori was made for the 2nd GameShell Game Jam.
However, having been unable to test the game on the GameShell during the development of the game, it is possible that it may have problems or bugs in the handheld version.

it is recommended to play it on PC at the moment.

All assets were created during the jam.
To play the LÖVE file versions you need to have LÖVE (love2d) installed on your machine.
LÖVE 11.1 is the preferred version.
Then follow these instructions: https://love2d.org/wiki/Getting_Started

Game by Samuele Zolfanelli.
Music by Marco Biagini.
